verses.text: Unto thee, O \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, do I lift up my soul.
O my God, I trust in thee: let me not be ashamed, let not mine enemies triumph over me.
Yea, let none that wait on thee be ashamed: let them be ashamed which transgress without cause.
Shew me thy ways, O \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*; teach me thy paths.
Lead me in thy truth, and teach me: for thou artthe God of my salvation; on thee do I wait all the day.
Remember, O \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, thy tender mercies and thy lovingkindnesses; for they have beenever of old.
Remember not the sins of my youth, nor my transgressions: according to thy mercy remember thou me for thy goodness’ sake, O \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*.
Good and upright isthe \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*: therefore will he teach sinners in the way.
The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way.
All the paths of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*aremercy and truth unto such as keep his covenant and his testimonies.
For thy name’s sake, O \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, pardon mine iniquity; for it isgreat.
What man ishe that feareth the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*? him shall he teach in the way thathe shall choose.
His soul shall dwell at ease; and his seed shall inherit the earth.
The secret of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*iswith them that fear him; and he will shew them his covenant.
Mine eyes areever toward the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*; for he shall pluck my feet out of the net.
Turn thee unto me, and have mercy upon me; for I amdesolate and afflicted.
The troubles of my heart are enlarged: Obring thou me out of my distresses.
Look upon mine affliction and my pain; and forgive all my sins.
Consider mine enemies; for they are many; and they hate me with cruel hatred.
O keep my soul, and deliver me: let me not be ashamed; for I put my trust in thee.
Let integrity and uprightness preserve me; for I wait on thee.
Redeem Israel, O God, out of all his troubles.
